Commented out code should not be checked in... Suggest removing this
Can use a meaningful variable name like muxType
Use phosphor logging APIs for logging :) I think this is a relic from your workspace, can be removed here if possible.
Either remove the log or add a DEBUG level phosphor-logging log
All veriable names should be lowerCamelCase
variables name are changed to lowerCamelCase
Did you update the EPS document for this request signature change? If not, that is first place to start with it.
NIT: Remove empty lines (Line no: 1295, 1283 and lines between if-else)
Minor debug log, other code lgtm.
You can update the log message to print the "path" for better future debug, As path now is with many options filled above.
Please update the documentation as well.
Don't change the scope of path.

We can keep the common bit here:

std::string path = "/dev/i2c-mux/";

nitpick: muxType of "backwardCompatability" does not make sense from a code readability perspective.

I suggest renaming the variable from "backwardCompatability" to "bbRiserMux" or something similar.
Why FruChannel here? We do have slots here. Please do consider taking the riser Slot number here.
considered the riser Slot number for both Left and Right riser mux.
Please remove this log/or make it a DEBUG level log..
Code looks good to me, so going ahead with +2.
